navigation.fmiServices: Services of the Finnish Meteorological Institute

about.title: The Weather app by the Finnish Meteorological Institute
about.body: Our Weather app provides weather information for almost all Finnish municipalities. If you enable location on your phone, the service will automatically show your location forecast for up to 10 days. Are you only interested in temperature or do you also want information about pressure, wind gusts or the UV index? Both weather forecasts and weather observations allow you to choose which weather data you want to see. You can also save your favorite locations in Finland and abroad on the app and browse them easily. The information is available as tables and graphs. The animations in the map section allow you to follow, for example, the movement of rainfall areas, and the rain forecast based on radar images shows the direction in which rainfall areas will move in the coming hours. The service displays current weather warnings at your chosen location and you can also easily check official weather warnings throughout Finland.

settings.locationSettingHint: Navigate to device settings to change app's location permissions

map.noLocationPermission: The application does not have permission to use your location

layersBottomSheet.showLocationAccessibilityHint: double tap to show current location on map
layersBottomSheet.hideLocationAccessibilityHint: double tap to hide current location on map
layersBottomSheet.selectLayerAccessibilityHint: double tap to select map layer

infoBottomSheet.rainRadarInfo: The intensity of the observed and forecasted precipitation is expressed in colors.
infoBottomSheet.mapLayersInfo: The observed rainfall on the map has been measured using a weather radar. Precipitation forecast is a short-term rain forecast based on radar images and weather forecasting models. In Finland, the timestep is 15 minutes and in Scandinavia, one hour.
infoBottomSheet.timeseriesLayerInfo: The weather forecast on the map shows the weather symbol and temperature for numerous locations around the world. Tap the symbol to display more weather information.

searchScreen.label: Search for a location
searchScreen.noResults: We could not find any results

infoSheet.saveHint: Save the place in the app memory.
infoSheet.deleteElaboration: The lated deleted places are displayed in Previous places.
infoSheet.locateElaboration: The application attempts to locate the user's device and fetch weather data based on the found location. Location accuracy depends on the user's device, not on the application.

setUp.termsAndConditionsDescription: You must accept the terms of use to use the service. Learn more about the Terms of Use by tapping the Terms of Use link.
setUp.locationDescription: The app uses the device location to locate the user. The location is used only for visual display purposes.

onboarding.weatherDescription: You can view versatile weather forecast and observation information in a format that suits you.
onboarding.mapDescription: For example, you can view the movement of rainfall in the next few hours on the map.
onboarding.warningsDescription: Be aware of weather warnings in force in your area.
onboarding.customizeDescription: In settings, you can select which weather data you want to view and select a dark theme for the app.

termsAndConditions.closeButtonAccessibilityHint: Close Terms of Use and navigate back to previous screen
termsAndConditions.generalTitle: Terms of Use for the Weather mobile application by the Finnish Meteorological Institute
termsAndConditions.contentsDescription: The user of the application has the right to use the application in accordance with these terms of use. The right of use is not exclusive and cannot be transferred to a third party. The license expires when the user deletes the application. The user of the application is responsible for the acquisition of the equipment, software and telecommunications connections needed to use the application, the costs incurred and the operation of the devices, software and connections. The user shall take care to use the application in a secure environment.
termsAndConditions.generalDescription: These terms of use apply to the use of the Weather mobile application (henceforth ‘application’) maintained by the Finnish Meteorological Institute. The purpose of the application is to provide the user with weather observations, forecasts and warnings. These terms of use constitute the agreement between the Finnish Meteorological Institute and the user of the application. These terms of use are binding and must be approved by the user when taking the application into use. The use of the application is voluntary. The application is provided through the App Store, Google Play Store or Huawei AppGallery, meaning that the user must comply with both these terms of use and the terms of use of the service provider in question.
termsAndConditions.personalInfoDescription: The application does not collect any personal data or information related to location or movement. At any time, the user may access the application settings and change or cancel the permissions they have given. The Finnish Meteorological Institute may use subcontractors to enable the service provided through the application.
termsAndConditions.immaterialRightsDescription: All the intellectual property rights and proprietary rights for the application belong to the Finnish Meteorological Institute. The application may contain open source software.
termsAndConditions.liabilityDescription: The Finnish Meteorological Institute monitors the system and seeks to prevent disturbances and interruptions to the service to the best of its ability. The Finnish Meteorological Institute is not responsible for any decisions made on the basis of the service or its lack of availability, nor for any direct or indirect damage caused by the use of the data. The Finnish Meteorological Institute is not liable for its obligations under these terms of use in cases of force majeure.
termsAndConditions.rightToChangesTitle: 5. Validity of and changes to terms of use
termsAndConditions.rightToChangesDescription: Validity of and changes to terms of use The Finnish Meteorological Institute has the right to change the contents of the application and these terms of use. Users shall be notified of any changes to the terms of use and any changes to the application content. In order for the user to continue using the application after changes have been applied to the terms of use, the user must accept the changed terms of use within the application.
termsAndConditions.applicableLawDescription: These terms of use are governed by Finnish law with the exception of its conflict of laws principles. Any disputes shall be resolved in the Helsinki District Court.
termsAndConditions.contactDetailsDescription:
The Finnish Meteorological Institute
PO Box 503
00101 Helsinki

feedback.title: Thank you for helping us improve our services!
feedback.body1: Use the Send feedback button to give us feedback on the application. The button will take you to your mobile phone’s email program.
feedback.body2: We will process all feedback we receive but cannot guarantee a personal reply.

error.checkConnection: Please check your connection and try again.

accessibility.generalTitle: Accessibility of the Finnish Meteorological Institute's Weather application
accessibility.generalAbout: This accessibility statement explains how the Finnish Meteorological Institute’s application complies with the Act on the Provision of Digital Services, what shortcomings there are in the accessibility of the application and how you can give us feedback on accessibility issues.
accessibility.generalDescription: This application is the responsibility of the Finnish Meteorological Institute. We want as many users as possible to be able to access our digital services. We take accessibility into account in the development of digital services.
accessibility.description1: This application partly meets the accessibility criteria required by law at level A and AA (WCAG 2.1). The application has some shortcomings in accessibility, which are described in more detail below.
accessibility.subTitle2: Did you notice shortcomings in accessibility?
accessibility.description2: We are constantly working to improve the accessibility of the application. If you discover any issues that are not described on this page, please let us know and we will do our best to remedy them. We will respond as soon as possible or within two weeks at the latest. You can contact us by email at:
accessibility.description3: The Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland enforces the implementation of accessibility requirements. If you are not happy with the reply you receive, or if you receive no reply within two weeks, you can give feedback to the Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland. The Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland website has details on how to lodge a complaint and how the matter will be processed.
accessibility.aviContact:
Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland, Accessibility Enforcement Unit

Telephone number for switchboard +385 295 016 000
accessibility.description4: The application is not yet fully accessible.
accessibility.subTitle5: Content or functions that are not yet accessible
accessibility.description5:
- The application contains elements that do not have a descriptive heading or label. (WCAG 2.4.6)
- Some weather symbols and rainfall bars in the application do not have sufficient contrast to the background or adjacent elements. (WCAG 1.4.3)
- Some of the application symbols (e.g. rainfall bars per day) do not have a text equivalent. (WCAG 1.1.1).
- The application has elements that are grouped together but may become in focus separately. (WCAG 2.4.3)
- The application features an embedded section of an online service whose language does not match the selected language of the application in all cases. (WCAG 3.1.1 and 3.1.2)
- The application contains sections that are in different languages and are in some cases read not in the language of the application. (WCAG 3.1.2)
accessibility.description5.1: The aim is to rectify the shortcomings listed here during 2024-2025 if possible without significant changes to app outlook or functionality.
accessibility.description6: The application provides map-based weather information. Under legislation, maps and map services do not have to meet accessibility requirements. The data visualised on maps is available elsewhere in the application in an accessible format.
accessibility.description7: The observations in this accessibility statement are based on a third-party assessment of whether the online service meets the legal requirements. The application was published on 10th May 2022. This statement was prepared on 21th April 2022. The statement was last updated on 8th April 2024.
accessibility.link1: Act on the Provision of Digital Services (306/2019)
